overview: Are you ready for things that go bump in the night? Poor Gemma Massey. She’s stumbled into a nest of vixen vampires who want nothing more than to ravage her body. Paul Chaplin to the rescue! He happens to know the one way to keep Gemma Massey safe from the lesbian vampires… A HARD COCK. So, of course, Paul Chaplin volunteers his penis to keep Gemma Massey safe.
title: The Hunger Victim
